text:
[Verse]
Woke up early morning
Sunshine on my face
Birds are sweetly singing
Brighten up this place

[Verse 2]
Step outside my doorway
Feel the gentle breeze
Flowers blooming brightly
Dancing with the trees

[Chorus]
Oh oh life is beautiful
Oh oh every day brand new
Oh oh feel the love around
Oh oh it's a dream come true

[Verse 3]
Skipping down the pathway
Whistling a happy tune
Smiles from every stranger
Lighting up the afternoon

[Chorus]
Oh oh life is beautiful
Oh oh every day brand new
Oh oh feel the love around
Oh oh it's a dream come true

[Bridge]
No rain can bring me down
No cloud can hide my glow
With sunshine all around
I'm ready just to go
title: Sunshine Melody
